questions.text: Why did Woody have a headache?
questions.correct: He hit his head on the bar.
options: He ran into a brick wall.
questions.explanation:
He hit his head on the bar.

	Frasier thought perhaps something happened mentally during the day that caused his headache. As he is explaining his day to Frasier, he hits his head on the bar and says, "Ouch, I hit my head again!"

questions.text: Why did Woody say he didn't read the paper?
questions.explanation:
too depressing.

	The others thinks he means because of all the bad news printed in papers. However he says, "Lucy always pulls the ball from Charlie Brown" and other things regarding other comics.

questions.text: Who got indicted for insider trading?
questions.explanation:
Robin.

	Robin used Rebecca's password to the company computer for his financial gain. Rebecca was very surprised and upset when she found out he was arrested because she was going to turn him in, but then changed her mind at the end of the previous episode when Robin asked her to marry him.

questions.text: Who turned in the man who got arrested?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	After Robin and Rebecca left the corporation office a man came out planning to fire Rebecca because her work hadn't been very good. However, he also was going to have her arrested since it was her computer that was used for the insider trading. Sam took the papers that Robin had shredded and said that if that wasn't proof he didn't know what was. Then in this episode, the corporation offered to sell Sam the bar for a reduced rate because he turned Robin in.

questions.text: For how much did Sam buy back the bar?
questions.explanation:
85 cents.

	The corporation offered to sell the bar for $1. However, Sam couldn't come up with $1 so he told them he had 85 cents. They excepted it and Sam got his bar back. He told the others that he "low balled" them.

questions.text: What did Rebecca say when she found out who turned Robin in?
questions.correct: You are a dead man buddy! You are a dead man!
options: I wish I never laid eyes on you!
I can't believe it, you've ruined my life!
questions.explanation:
You are a dead man buddy! You are a dead man!.

	Before she said that, they were all chanting, "Sammy's got the bar back, Sammy's got the bar back!" After Rebecca said about him being a dead man they started to chant: "Sammy is a dead man, Sammy is a dead man!"

moose head.

	It was one of the things Sam had hanging in the bar the first time he owned it. Woody found it and pretended it could talk and said hi to Sam. When Sam said hi back Woody told him the moose head wasn't really talking.

questions.text: Did Sam think it was okay for a man to cry?
questions.explanation:
no.

	Woody said, "I didn't think so". Cliff said a few manly tears every now and then were okay.

questions.text: Who came to the bar looking for the one who was arrested earlier?
options: the person who put up his bond
questions.explanation:
F.B.I.

	It turned out that Robin jumped bail and skipped the country. Rebecca just became more and more upset as the day's events progressed.

questions.text: Who did Rebecca have sex with in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	She told Sam that everything she did was wrong. Then she started to come on to him. Sam told her he thought she was making a mistake. She replied "Wrong is what I do best". Robin then returns, opens the office door where they were having sex and said, "Oh my God!".
